content: make your own crochet anemone flower my easy step by step written tutorial anemones are one of my all time favourite spring flowers these gorgeous flowers come in a huge variety of colours perfect for any event make your own realistic crochet flowers with my easy to follow pattern crochet pattern includes step by step written / photo instructions showing you how to easily make your own crochet anemone flower in a few steps make crochet flowers with any yarn from your stash & the matching crochet hook a quick easy pattern ideal for every crocheter pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size the pattern is written in us terms and includes conversion table in uk terms skill level easy if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moara crochet © each pattern has taken many hours to provide clear instructions & been tested by purchasing you agree not to distribute the pattern in any way for free or sale if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
